dcterms:creator: S. King

dcterms:description: The Blizzard Challenge 2018 dataset consists of stories read in an expressive style for a 4–6 year old audience, containing 6.5 hours of professionally-recorded speech from a female speaker of standard southern British English.
dcterms:title: Blizzard Challenge 2018 dataset

dcterms:creator: E. Székely
G. E. Henter

dcterms:description: Dialogue data used for validating the intonation codes, focusing on segmenting and selecting spontaneous dialogue for TTS.
dcterms:title: Dialogue data

dcterms:creator: D. Goodhue
L. Harrison
Y. C. Su

dcterms:description: Dialogue data referred to for future validation, focusing on intonational contours in English.
dcterms:title: Dialogue data for future validation
